name: World of War : Battlegrounds
description: World of War : Battlegrounds is a low poly shooter multiplayer game. Make alliances to conquer the enemies easier or try to win the battle alone. You can try to stand in this war without any consequences. Be brave and wise to win the battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
